caption: Great bar! Fun place, very nice atmosphere. Geeky vibes. Good fun! (Don‚Äôt forget to download the app!)

Best place ever if you're like.... let's say it.. an awsome geek!!! Bartenders are nice.. awsome..friendly whatever you like .. think about a quality.. they have it !!!!üëåüëå Anyway i like this place so much and spent so my time here m, that i brought my girl to first date in here. ü§£ü§£

The bar is located close to the subway and fast foods but is in a small street so it's nice, not too exposed. The concept of this bar is geek - video games, they have few game machines and they also have a room downstairs where they organise theme nights (Mario kart, etc.) and people car bring their own remote? to play with each other. Also they use nice Mario kart eco cups consign√© 2‚Ç¨ , it's cool but make sure to keep your cup around because some people will bring it back and get the 2‚Ç¨ for them. I'd say it's more a geeky bar than a bar where you can dance like crazy (the sound volume isn't crazy).
I booked a part of the bar for a birthday, we had a great time with my friends! The staff was very nice, friendly and helpful. Good ambiance and drinks, thank you for the warm welcome!

Had an amazing night here with 10 friends on a trip to Paris. We played darts, chess and retro arcade games. Pitchers of beer were good value and the staff were super friendly. A perfect non pretentious bar with a great vibe!
I had a great night with friends, the drinks üç∫üçπ and snacks üßÄü•ñ is delicious. All team is amazing!‚Ä¶ I'll be back baby! üòÉüòäüíì

Friendly stuff and cheap happy hour beer. It was not the best beer ever but 5 euros is alright and the bar is really geek oriented.  Had a nice soir√©e there with my colleagues.  It did smell really bad
Was feeling a bit parched a little after midnight on a Monday morning, found this place. Great vibe - a little geeky, which works for me - fun music and great drinks! C'est bien!
They only have a single brand of pastis but the place is really cool and the bar tenders are friendly Try their spicy shots!!
We went for a birthday excellent  service !
Music was so loud we had to go outside to speak... And it was freezing!! Plus, cocktails are expensive and not great. Would not recommend this bar
It is a good "geek" bar, you have some games to play, and you can drink something. Good, indeed, but nothing special IMHO.
No pinball. Don't believe the hype, no pinball here. Beer and staff OK
Very trendy bar with super sound friendly bar staff that add and create a great vibe!
Great ambiance, cheap drinks, darts, arcades, and you can rent the basement for a private party. AWESOME
very good bar, really new concept, did have a great party there
Such a lovely and friendly bar, wish i could give more then 5 stars.
Good drinks, super personnel, great music and fun darts game
An odd but very fun place if you're into geeky stuff.
Great place. Can be quite full on a Friday evening !
A lively place to hangout.. amazing music ....
Super bar!! A must go for everyone

The owners and cooks are very friendly and the atmosphere is family-friendly. The meat is perfectly cooked and the choice of wines perfect. Everything that is offered is based on market availability. I highly recommend!

Great atmosphere at Deux Point Zero. I had reserved tables for my husband's birthday and we all had a lovely evening. The choice of drinks and food to share was good and reasonably priced. The bartenders were very friendly and efficient in serving everyone quickly. The decor is nice and it's great to have arcade games to have fun with friends. I recommend!

We reserved the downstairs room for a company evening (40 people), everything went really well!! Denis listened and managed everything really well! I recommend their food, it‚Äôs just excellent, they serve it hot and it‚Äôs very high quality!! I highly recommend

Great birthday at bar 2.0 Denis, William and the team are very welcoming. The atmosphere is young and friendly, the gamer decor is very good spirited. Evening until 2am with security guard. At the top, I recommend

Booked for 17 people, we had a superb evening!! Will and his team were great and caring. We loved the super original and friendly place!! The activities, photobooth and dart games are validated, as are the tapas!! We highly recommend üòÅ

Great Saturday evening with friends in this bar! The decor is super nice and the staff is very pleasant. Special mention to the darts game and the small arcade machine where we had a lot of fun! I highly recommend!

Very good bar with geeky atmosphere. The music is nice without being too loud. The prices are reasonable (35th for 10 shots). Some tapas/boards available (I liked the jalapenos). A photobooth, a dartboard, in short, lots of things to keep you entertained.

William and Denis are truly young cracks, five-star technical gestures. They are one of those bartenders who make a bar loved by their simple presence. I recommend with eyes closed (and ears open ü§™ü§™ compared to the blindtest)
